name: The Binding of Guppy: Antibirth
description:
A rouge-like prequal to The Binding of Isaac and Super Meat Boy.

Game Name: The Binding Of Guppy: Antibirth

Application: guppy_ng.exe

Developer: Asriel2474

Publisher: Playism

Genre: Action, Rouge-Like

Followup: Asriel's Adventure: Undertale (Coming Soon)

Rating: Everyone 10 / Teen

Q and A:

1. Q. Is this okay for my child that is 6 years old?

A. Not That Much so No.

2. Q. Does this have DLC?

A. Yes

3. Q. Why does the follow up to this game not out yet?

A. Because, here at Playism we do hard work on our games to enjoy for the public.

4. Q. Does this game have a OST?

A. Yes but not out.
